Articles.Content:
I droped in to the KSP TV tonight, saw a few in the chat box. I joined and said hello. No reply????

I made a comment on VTOL F35 that was spoke about and no comment?

I made a comment about barrel rolls that was spoke about and no one said a darn thing.

What a sorry unsocial group there. As to the barrel roll that was said to be impossible see this video.

As to going back there to KSPTV I fill there not worth my time.

barrel roll @9.09 in video done on the old 18.1 system.

If any of you true adult fans would like to chat drop me a PM, and to the rest, well if and when MMO EVER HAPPENS. I GOT A BOMB FOR YOU ALL.
